statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); project=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.project_dir'); session=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.session_id' | cut -c1-8); user=$(whoami); git_branch=""; if [ -d "$cwd/.git" ]; then cd "$cwd" && git_branch=" $(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'detached')"; fi; printf "\033[48;2;195;134;241m\033[38;2;255;255;255m %s \033[0m\033[48;2;255;71;156m\033[38;2;255;255;255m 📁 %s \033[0m%s\033[48;2;131;118;156m\033[38;2;255;255;255m ⚡ %s \033[0m\033[48;2;46;125;50m\033[38;2;255;255;255m 🔧 %s \033[0m" "$user" "$(basename "$cwd")" "$([ -n "$git_branch" ] && printf "\033[48;2;255;251;56m\033[38;2;25;53;73m🌿%s \033[0m" "$git_branch")" "$model" "$(basename "$project")"
